Package pu.loopScheduler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LoopScheduler
    An interface that is implemented by every LoopScheduler instance in this library.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLoopScheduler  
    DynamicLoopScheduler
    This class splits loop iterations into constant chunk sizes depending on the number of threads that are given to the constructor.
    GuidedLoopScheduler
    This class partitions loop iterations using a similar approach to the DynamicLoopScheduler; however the chunk size shrinks as portions of the loop iterations are assigned to the threads.
    LoopRange
    This class provides the elements for iterating over a partition of a loop.
    LoopSchedulerFactory
    This class provides static methods for creating the appropriate loop scheduler based on the scheduling type specified by the user.
    StaticLoopScheduler
    This class partitions the iterations over a loop into static chunks.
    ThreadID
    ThreadID assigns threads with a relative ID with respect to the group of threads that are running by a framework.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractLoopScheduler.LoopCondition  
    LoopSchedulerFactory.LoopSchedulingType
